title: PES University is proud to be chosen as the inaugural site for one of ten Co-Innovation Centres (CiC) by IIT Delhi's I-Hub Foundation for Cobotics (IHFC).

comments.body:
Title is incorrect. 

PES University is proud to be chosen by IITD ‚ùå
IITD is proud to be chosen by PES University ‚úÖ

/s
PES is one step closer to becoming IIT Bangalore ü•∞
idk how do you not get it, but this is just an IIT forming bonds with another IIT, GO JAGS ! HAIL DORE! no actually wait - HAIL THE AMAZING ALUMNI! and also last but not the least HAIL BUN SAMOSA !
we are alrdy IIT bangalore, manifest this stuff and watch the quality of PESU rise so fkn much
